value.title: Get more info with Power Query tracing in Power BI Desktop

value.title: Microsoft R, Data Science and Power BI

We use Microsoft R Open and then move onto Power BI Desktop.  The example used in Microsoft R Open is the Anscombe's quartet.   Download sample

value.title: Power BI Auditing
value.excerpt: In this video, I look at the Power BI Auditing feature that was made available a few weeks ago. I show how to turn it on and how to search. value.title: Power BI For Report Consumers

value.title: Row-Level Security in Power BI - Revisited
